mapper.select: SELECT M.* FROM GROUPS G JOIN PARTICIPATION P ON G.GROUP_ID = P.GROUP_ID JOIN MEMBERS M ON M.ID = P.ID WHERE G.GROUP_ID = #{groupId}

SELECT GC.COMMENT_ID COMMENT_ID, GC.GROUP_ID COMMENT_GROUP_ID, GC.ID COMMENT_MEMBER_ID, COMMENT_MEMBER.NICKNAME COMMENT_NICKNAME, GC.CREATED_AT COMMENT_CREATED_AT, GC.COMMENT_CONTENT COMMENT_CONTENT, GRC.RECOMMENT_ID RECOMMENT_ID, GRC.COMMENT_ID RECOMMENT_COMMENT_ID, GRC.RECOMMENT_CONTENT RECOMMENT_CONTENT, GRC.CREATED_AT RECOMMENT_CREATED_AT, RECOMMENT_MEMBER.NICKNAME RECOMMENT_NICKNAME, RECOMMENT_MEMBER.ID RECOMMENT_WRITER_ID FROM GROUP_COMMENTS GC LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERS COMMENT_MEMBER ON GC.ID = COMMENT_MEMBER.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN GROUP_RECOMMENTS GRC ON GC.COMMENT_ID = GRC.COMMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBERS RECOMMENT_MEMBER ON RECOMMENT_MEMBER.ID = GRC.ID WHERE GC.GROUP_ID = #{groupId}
